Posts.Content: I am thin and would more than likely need implants. Implants make it difficult to see in a mammogram. I am thinking if my core biopsy is positive to go with no reconstruction. I know that I might be jumping to conclusions, but I just feel better being prepared for the worst. Thank you for your opinions.
Posts.Title: Reconstruction vs. no reconstruction

Posts.Content: Jomar, How are you doing and what decision did you make?
Posts.Title: Lumpectomy Vs. Mastectomy
